Deputy First Minister Martin McGuinness says no action has been agreed on a way forward on the Renewable Heating Incentive (RHI) scandal.

Write a short summary for the following passage:
19 December 2016 Last updated at 18:25 GMT
But, he told the BBC that Sinn Féin will put forward a motion calling for an investigation into RHI when the assembly meets again in January.
Summary:
